title: The Shadow's Servant
description: If knowledge is power, then what's a secret?A year after her disappearance, Marcus Fith still has no hope of joining the search for his missing sister. “He’s too important,” so he isn’t allowed. But when a mysterious visitor delivers a warning to him—a letter written in his own blood—things quickly move from bad to fiendish. Ellie’s not only missing, but she’s also in serious trouble, and time is running out. A secret plan has been in place from the beginning, and unbeknownst to Marcus, it has just been activated.Follow Marcus as he sets out to rescue his sister, only to find that she may not be the same free-spirited girl he once knew. Marcus must navigate the magical world as it falls apart around him, all the while trying hard not to play the role orchestrated for him—the part he unknowingly can't escape.
author: Justin Swapp
